story_ch0064_00_rival_06_04000/2401_1201: Are you ready to give up now?

It’s about time you and that Hoopa make
yourselves useful to me.
Who is this puny little Pokémon?
Rockruff! Get back in your Poké Ball!
Arrrgh! All of these insolent, little...

There is nothing more unpleasant than a simple
tool that tries to work against you!
How dare you defy me, you powerless nothing!
